Interrupts.Name: Scuttle
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe moves adjacent to the Tick.
Interrupts.Effects: The Tick may dash 3. If they move into a pit, they may also then teleport to any other pit space.

Actions.Name: Lick Knife
Actions.Description: The Tick's abilities all have slay: gain +1 action this turn.

Actions.Name: Leg Trap
Actions.Description: The Tick chooses a foe in a pit. That foe becomes immobile. That foe can choose to take [D]+[fray] damage from the Tick to break themselves out of this effect as a free action on their turn, or else can save against this effect at the end of their turn, ending it on a success. If the foe is shoved or teleported out of the space, they also take [D]+[fray] from the Tick, but this effect ends.
